docs.snippet: MILFORD, Conn., Sept. 7 (UP) --The defending champion, Bill Cox of Darien, today gained enough points in his speedy Zig Zagger to win the international Lightning Class championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: MILFORD, Conn., Sept. 7 (UP) --The defending champion, Bill Cox of Darien, today gained enough points in his speedy Zig Zagger to win the international Lightning Class championship.

headline.main: LIGHTNING TITLE CAPTURED BY COX; Darien Skipper Is Victor on Point Total After Taking 5th Place in Last Heat

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Sept. 13--The chief delegate of Communist Hungary was challenged today to admit or deny that he had sided with antiSoviet Freedom Fighters during the Hungarian revolt.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Sept. 13--The chief delegate of Communist Hungary was challenged today to admit or deny that he had sided with antiSoviet Freedom Fighters during the Hungarian revolt.
docs.abstract: Amb Rodriguez Fabregat (Uruguay) asks Mod if he backed rebels during revolt as charged in com rept; Mod denies charge, says com has no proof; Nunez-Portuondo apologizes for charging Mod is Russian; says he meant Mod's predecessor P Kos

headline.main: Hungarian U.N. Aide Is Asked If He Backed the 1956 Revolt; Mod, Delegate, Questioned in Assembly by Member of Inquiry Committee Need of Explanation Cuban Makes Apology

byline.original: By KATHLEEN TELTSCH Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Saturday, Sept. 14--The General Assembly adopted early today a resolution condemning the Soviet Union's "armed intervention" in Hungary and its "continued defiance" of earlier Assembly resolutions.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Saturday, Sept. 14--The General Assembly adopted early today a resolution condemning the Soviet Union's "armed intervention" in Hungary and its "continued defiance" of earlier Assembly resolutions.

headline.main: U.N. Vote Condemns Soviet For Its Actions in Hungary; Assembly, 60 to 10, Denounces 'Armed Intervention'--Bids Prince Wan Seek End of 'Defiance' of World Body SOVIET CENSURED BY U.N. ASSEMBLY

byline.original: By THOMAS J. HAMILTON Special to The New York Times
